targets.rawSql: SELECT ifNull(avg(output_fps), 0) AS current_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

SELECT timeframe, avg_fps FROM (SELECT 1 AS sort_key, '1 day' AS timeframe, ifNull(avg(output_fps), 0) AS avg_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT 2 AS sort_key, '1 week' AS timeframe, ifNull(avg(output_fps), 0) AS avg_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT 3 AS sort_key, '1 month' AS timeframe, ifNull(avg(output_fps), 0) AS avg_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 DAY AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))) ORDER BY sort_key

SELECT uniqExact(lower(orchestrator_address)) AS active_orchestrators_24h FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

WITH latest_gpu AS (SELECT gpu_id, argMax(lower(orchestrator_address), snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_address, argMax(model_id, snapshot_ts) AS model_id, max(snapshot_ts) AS latest_snapshot_ts FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_snapshots WHERE ifNull(gpu_id, '') != '' GROUP BY gpu_id) SELECT uniqExact(gpu_id) AS known_gpus FROM latest_gpu WHERE latest_snapshot_ts >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), orchestrator_address))

SELECT time, sum(revenue_eth) AS total_revenue_eth FROM (SELECT toStartOfInterval(window_start, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time, sum(if(fee_payment_eth > 1000000000, fee_payment_eth / 1000000000000000000.0, fee_payment_eth)) AS revenue_eth FROM livepeer_analytics.v_api_network_demand WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start) GROUP BY time UNION ALL SELECT toStartOfInterval(now(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time, toFloat64(0) AS revenue_eth) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(event_timestamp, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time, pipeline, avg(toFloat64(price_per_unit) * 1000000.0 / greatest(toFloat64(ifNull(pixels_per_unit, 1)), 1.0) / 1000000000.0) AS quoted_price_gwei_per_mp FROM livepeer_analytics.network_capabilities WHERE $__timeFilter(event_timestamp) AND price_per_unit IS NOT NULL AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY time, pipeline ORDER BY time

WITH latest_quotes AS (SELECT lower(nc.orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address, nc.pipeline AS pipeline, nc.model_id AS model_id, argMax(nc.price_per_unit, nc.event_timestamp) AS latest_price_per_unit, argMax(nc.pixels_per_unit, nc.event_timestamp) AS latest_pixels_per_unit, max(nc.event_timestamp) AS latest_quote_ts FROM livepeer_analytics.network_capabilities nc WHERE nc.price_per_unit IS NOT NULL AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), nc.model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(nc.orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY orchestrator_address, pipeline, model_id) SELECT latest_quote_ts AS "Quote Time", pipeline AS "Pipeline", orchestrator_address AS "Orchestrator", model_id AS "Model", round(toFloat64(latest_price_per_unit) * 1000000.0 / greatest(toFloat64(ifNull(latest_pixels_per_unit, 1)), 1.0) / 1000000000.0, 4) AS "Price (gwei/MP)" FROM latest_quotes ORDER BY latest_quote_ts DESC, "Price (gwei/MP)" DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT toStartOfInterval(window_start, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time, avg(e2e_latency_ms) / 1000.0 AS avg_e2e_latency_s, quantileTDigest(0.95)(e2e_latency_ms) / 1000.0 AS p95_e2e_latency_s FROM livepeer_analytics.v_api_gpu_metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start) AND e2e_latency_ms IS NOT NULL AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time

WITH top_orch AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE $__timeFilter(event_timestamp) GROUP BY orchestrator_address ORDER BY avg(output_fps) DESC LIMIT 8), labels AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address, argMax(orchestrator_url, latest_snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_url FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current GROUP BY orchestrator_address) SELECT toStartOfInterval(s.event_timestamp, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) AS time, coalesce(nullIf(labels.orchestrator_url, ''), lower(s.orchestrator_address)) AS orchestrator, avg(s.output_fps) AS avg_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status s LEFT JOIN labels ON labels.orchestrator_address = lower(s.orchestrator_address) WHERE $__timeFilter(s.event_timestamp) AND (((('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '')) AND lower(s.orchestrator_address) IN (SELECT orchestrator_address FROM top_orch)) OR ('${orchestrator:csv}' != '__all' AND '${orchestrator:csv}' != '' AND has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address)))) GROUP BY time, orchestrator ORDER BY time

WITH top_orch AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address FROM livepeer_analytics.mv_jitter_stats WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start) GROUP BY orchestrator_address ORDER BY avgMerge(avg_fps_state) DESC LIMIT 8), labels AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address, argMax(orchestrator_url, latest_snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_url FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current GROUP BY orchestrator_address) SELECT s.window_start AS time, coalesce(nullIf(labels.orchestrator_url, ''), lower(s.orchestrator_address)) AS orchestrator, stddevPopMerge(s.stddev_fps_state) / nullIf(avgMerge(s.avg_fps_state), 0) AS jitter_coeff FROM livepeer_analytics.mv_jitter_stats s LEFT JOIN labels ON labels.orchestrator_address = lower(s.orchestrator_address) WHERE $__timeFilter(s.window_start) AND (((('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '')) AND lower(s.orchestrator_address) IN (SELECT orchestrator_address FROM top_orch)) OR ('${orchestrator:csv}' != '__all' AND '${orchestrator:csv}' != '' AND has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address)))) GROUP BY time, orchestrator ORDER BY time

SELECT toStartOfInterval(window_start, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AS time, pipeline, avg(avg_output_fps) AS avg_fps FROM livepeer_analytics.v_api_network_demand WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start) GROUP BY time, pipeline ORDER BY time

SELECT lower(s.orchestrator_address) AS "Orchestrator Address", avg(s.output_fps) AS "Avg FPS" FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status s WHERE $__timeFilter(s.event_timestamp) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY "Orchestrator Address" ORDER BY "Avg FPS" DESC LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Orchestrators by Avg FPS (Bar Chart)

targets.rawSql: WITH fps AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address, pipeline, countDistinct(stream_id) AS active_streams, avg(output_fps) AS avg_fps, quantileTDigest(0.95)(output_fps) AS p95_fps, sum(restart_count) AS total_restarts FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY orchestrator_address, pipeline), lat AS (SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator_address, pipeline, avg(e2e_latency_ms) / 1000.0 AS avg_e2e_latency_s, quantileTDigest(0.95)(e2e_latency_ms) / 1000.0 AS p95_e2e_latency_s FROM livepeer_analytics.v_api_gpu_metrics WHERE window_start >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND e2e_latency_ms IS NOT NULL AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY orchestrator_address, pipeline) SELECT fps.orchestrator_address AS "Orchestrator", fps.pipeline AS "Pipeline", fps.active_streams AS "Active Streams", round(fps.avg_fps, 2) AS "Avg FPS", round(fps.p95_fps, 2) AS "P95 FPS", round(ifNull(lat.avg_e2e_latency_s, 0), 2) AS "Avg E2E Latency (s)", round(ifNull(lat.p95_e2e_latency_s, 0), 2) AS "P95 E2E Latency (s)", fps.total_restarts AS "Restarts (24h)" FROM fps LEFT JOIN lat ON lat.orchestrator_address = fps.orchestrator_address AND lat.pipeline = fps.pipeline ORDER BY fps.active_streams DESC, fps.avg_fps DESC LIMIT 20

WITH latest_gpu AS (SELECT gpu_id, argMax(lower(orchestrator_address), snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_address, argMax(gpu_name, snapshot_ts) AS gpu_name, argMax(model_id, snapshot_ts) AS model_id, max(snapshot_ts) AS latest_snapshot_ts FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_snapshots WHERE ifNull(gpu_id, '') != '' GROUP BY gpu_id) SELECT ifNull(gpu_name, 'unknown') AS gpu_type, countDistinct(gpu_id) AS gpu_count FROM latest_gpu WHERE latest_snapshot_ts >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), orchestrator_address)) GROUP BY gpu_type ORDER BY gpu_count DESC

WITH latest_gpu AS (SELECT gpu_id, argMax(lower(orchestrator_address), snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_address, argMax(gpu_name, snapshot_ts) AS gpu_name, argMax(gpu_memory_total, snapshot_ts) AS gpu_memory_total, argMax(pipeline, snapshot_ts) AS pipeline, argMax(model_id, snapshot_ts) AS model_id, max(snapshot_ts) AS latest_snapshot_ts FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_snapshots WHERE ifNull(gpu_id, '') != '' GROUP BY gpu_id) SELECT latest_snapshot_ts AS "Latest Snapshot", pipeline AS "Pipeline", latest_gpu.orchestrator_address AS "Orchestrator", model_id AS "Model", gpu_id AS "GPU ID", gpu_name AS "GPU Type", round(toFloat64(ifNull(gpu_memory_total, 0)) / 1073741824.0, 1) AS "GPU Memory (GB)" FROM latest_gpu WHERE latest_snapshot_ts >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), orchestrator_address)) ORDER BY latest_snapshot_ts DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT toFloat64(countDistinct(stream_id)) AS value FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

SELECT toFloat64(uniqExact(lower(orchestrator_address))) AS value FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

SELECT toFloat64(uniqExact(gpu_id)) AS value FROM (SELECT gpu_id, argMax(model_id, snapshot_ts) AS model_id, argMax(lower(orchestrator_address), snapshot_ts) AS orchestrator_address, max(snapshot_ts) AS latest_snapshot_ts FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_snapshots WHERE ifNull(gpu_id, '') != '' GROUP BY gpu_id) g WHERE latest_snapshot_ts >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), orchestrator_address))

SELECT toFloat64(ifNull(avg(output_fps),0)) AS value FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

SELECT toFloat64(ifNull(avg(e2e_latency_ms),0))/1000.0 AS value FROM livepeer_analytics.v_api_gpu_metrics WHERE window_start >= now() - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND e2e_latency_ms IS NOT NULL AND ('${model:csv}' = '__all' OR '${model:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${model:csv}'), model_id)) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address)))

SELECT 'gateway' AS "From", lower(orchestrator_address) AS "To Orchestrator", ifNull(nullIf(pipeline, ''), 'unknown') AS "Pipeline", countDistinct(stream_id) AS "Active Streams (15m)", round(avg(output_fps), 2) AS "Avg FPS" FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status WHERE event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY "From", "To Orchestrator", "Pipeline" ORDER BY "Active Streams (15m)" DESC, "Avg FPS" DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT toStartOfInterval(ts, INTERVAL 1 MINUTE) AS time, stage, count() AS events_per_minute FROM (SELECT s.event_timestamp AS ts, 'Status Samples' AS stage FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status s WHERE $__timeFilter(s.event_timestamp) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT t.event_timestamp AS ts, 'Trace Events' AS stage FROM livepeer_analytics.stream_trace_events t WHERE $__timeFilter(t.event_timestamp) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(t.orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT n.event_timestamp AS ts, 'Capability Updates' AS stage FROM livepeer_analytics.network_capabilities n WHERE $__timeFilter(n.event_timestamp) AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(n.orchestrator_address)))) GROUP BY time, stage ORDER BY time

SELECT lower(s.orchestrator_address) AS "Orchestrator Address", countDistinct(s.stream_id) AS "Active Streams" FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status s WHERE s.event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 15 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address))) GROUP BY "Orchestrator Address" ORDER BY "Active Streams" DESC LIMIT 12

SELECT ts AS "Time", stage AS "Stage", pipeline AS "Pipeline", orchestrator AS "Orchestrator Address", stream_id AS "Stream ID", request_id AS "Request ID" FROM (SELECT s.event_timestamp AS ts, 'status' AS stage, s.pipeline AS pipeline, lower(s.orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator, s.stream_id AS stream_id, s.request_id AS request_id FROM livepeer_analytics.ai_stream_status s WHERE s.event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(s.orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT t.event_timestamp AS ts, t.trace_type AS stage, '' AS pipeline, lower(t.orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator, t.stream_id AS stream_id, t.request_id AS request_id FROM livepeer_analytics.stream_trace_events t WHERE t.event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(t.orchestrator_address))) UNION ALL SELECT n.event_timestamp AS ts, 'capability' AS stage, n.pipeline AS pipeline, lower(n.orchestrator_address) AS orchestrator, '' AS stream_id, '' AS request_id FROM livepeer_analytics.network_capabilities n WHERE n.event_timestamp >= now() - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE AND ('${orchestrator:csv}' = '__all' OR '${orchestrator:csv}' = '' OR has(splitByChar(',', '${orchestrator:csv}'), lower(n.orchestrator_address)))) ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 100

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT model_id FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current WHERE ifNull(model_id,'') != '' ORDER BY model_id
list.label: Model
list.name: model
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT model_id FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current WHERE ifNull(model_id,'') != '' ORDER BY model_id

list.definition: SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS __text, lower(orchestrator_address) AS __value FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current GROUP BY lower(orchestrator_address) ORDER BY __text
list.label: Orchestrator
list.name: orchestrator
list.query: SELECT lower(orchestrator_address) AS __text, lower(orchestrator_address) AS __value FROM livepeer_analytics.dim_orchestrator_capability_current GROUP BY lower(orchestrator_address) ORDER BY __text
